main event: Several round yellow objects were observed in Holtville, California on 03 January 1957.
interesting points: The objects appeared stationary for the entire 5 minutes of observation., The objects faded out of sight after being observed through binoculars., The report suggests that the sighting could be attributed to a high-flying aircraft., There were discrepancies in the number of objects reported at different times., The event sparked further investigations by the U.S. Air Force.
